definition: sanctioned by or consistent with or operating under the law determining the fundamental political principles of a government, a regular walk taken as a form of exercise
details:
adjective
- sanctioned by or consistent with or operating under the law determining the fundamental political principles of a government
= example: sanctioned by or consistent with or operating under the law determining the fundamental political principles of a government
- constitutional in the structure of something (especially your physical makeup)
= synonyms: constituent, constitutive, organic
- existing as an essential constituent or characteristic
= synonyms: integral, inherent, built-in, inbuilt
- of benefit to or intended to benefit your physical makeup
= example: of benefit to or intended to benefit your physical makeup
noun
- a regular walk taken as a form of exercise
